message: They lose your place, they start on load, they suck at finding good related content...
is anyone making an honest go at this?

the same way SO does a good job being the goto repo for coding questions, I'd love it if someone could do a great job cataloging talks/slides/presentations and making them findable.. and accepting that I may watch a three hour talk over the course of three days.
@phill I'm doing a small side/weekend project that might help out with this. I definitely feel your pain
If you want to test it out shoot me an email (jtlallo +gmail postfix). Not ready to post it live yet but could be looking for testers/input within few weeks
